com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.util
Class DummyProgress

java.lang.Object
  com.alvermont.terraj.fracplanet.util.DummyProgress
All Implemented Interfaces:
Progress
public class DummyProgress
extends java.lang.Object
implements Progress

A dummy implementation of the progress interface that does nothing but implement the methods with empty actions.

Version:
$Id: DummyProgress.java,v 1.2 2006/07/06 06:58:34 martin Exp $
Author:
martin

progressStep in interface Progress
